statements: DELETE FROM asset_information WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM asset_information WHERE asset_id = 101 AND maintenance_status = TRUE
DELETE FROM asset_information WHERE location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM maintenance_plans WHERE plan_id = 100 AND maintenance_type = 'Routine';
DELETE FROM assets WHERE maintenance_status = 'Overdue' AND installation_date < DATE '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM maintenance_personnel WHERE department = 'Maintenance' AND hire_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM replacement_history WHERE replacement_reason = 'Equipment upgrade' AND replacement_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM replacement_records WHERE reason = 'End of Life' AND asset_id = 'aa73b9be-98f3-4d00-8a99-4a7e15f3a7ae';
